subject: Shooting (Sport)
Gun Control
Olympic Games (2012)
School Shootings
lead_paragraph: Georgina Geikie will be the first Briton in an Olympic cartridge pistol competition since Parliament outlawed private ownership of nearly all handguns after a 1996 school shooting.
snippet: Georgina Geikie will be the first Briton in an Olympic cartridge pistol competition since Parliament outlawed private ownership of nearly all handguns after a 1996 school shooting.
